name: Dystopia (itch) (Antharuu)
description:
Dystopia is a "Hack'n'Slash" type game with "Rogue lite" mechanics. 

In this world time and space have become unstable and creatures from all horizons and eras have invaded the world. Explore the dimensional cracks through space and time to try to save this world.

I create this game in stream on twitch so don't hesitate to join us in this adventure.

The game is still in development and new updates will come soon so don't forget to follow the game on itch.io.

I also point out that the game will probably not be free. The price is not fixed yet, but I advise you to take advantage of the alpha versions to give me your opinions. I will probably offer keys on my discord server and on my Twitch channel during the release, so I recommend you to join us there.

Twitch: Antharuu - Twitch

Youtube: Antharuu - Youtube

Discord: https://discord.gg/n6HCXsD
